title: 29 Cheap (But Expensive-Looking) Desks You Can Buy on Amazon
text:
29 items in this article 16 items on sale! Photo: Courtesy of the vendor

As anyone who works from home will tell you, having a designated place to hunker down is paramount when it comes to productivity. And since many people spend most of their time working at desks, having a good one can help keep you sane, even when emails start piling up or the Wi-Fi goes out. Like any type of furniture, desks can run the price gamut, but you definitely don’t need to spend a ton of money to get a desk that looks good. We sifted through Amazon for affordable (and stylish) desks that’ll give your home office an upgrade, and found all sorts of options, including more than one midcentury modern style, ones for standing desk converts, and others for lovers of all things acrylic.

Rivet Mid-Century Curved Wood Computer Desk $221 (was $257, now 14% off) The curved, clean lines and darker wood make this desk look at least three times as expensive as it actually is. $221 at Amazon Buy $221 at Amazon Buy

Coaster Home Furnishings Clear and Chrome Writing Desk $300 (was $303, now 1% off) It’s on the other end of the design spectrum, but this acrylic desk will also give your office an open, airy vibe — not to mention bring more transparency to your work. $300 at Amazon Buy $300 at Amazon Buy

Coaster Home Furnishings Writing Desk with Glass Sides If you want the acrylic look but need storage space, too. $177 at Amazon Buy $177 at Amazon Buy

Ameriwood Home Parsons Desk $65 (was $75, now 13% off) This sleek, lacquered piece is super versatile and will fit a wide array of home-decor styles. $65 at Amazon Buy $65 at Amazon Buy

Belham Living Carter Midcentury Modern Writing Desk We love the rounded edges and the spindly legs of this (vaguely anthropomorphic) desk. $281 at Amazon Buy $281 at Amazon Buy

Furniture of America Olga Antique Writing Desk $145 (was $500, now 71% off) We could easily picture this desk on a vintage reseller site. $145 at Amazon Buy $145 at Amazon Buy

FUNKOCO Writing Desk with Detachable Hutch, Black $130 (was $200, now 35% off) Cloudlike, yet sophisticated. Plus, it also comes in pink, blue, and white, making it a great choice for a kid’s room. $130 at Amazon Buy $130 at Amazon Buy

Novogratz Xavier Computer Desk While the dark blue and walnut finishes seem like a strange pair, we think they work in this just-eccentric-enough desk. $88 at Amazon Buy $88 at Amazon Buy

Target Marketing Systems Wood Corner Desk $85 (was $88, now 3% off) A space-saving option that can fit into just about any corner. $85 at Amazon Buy $85 at Amazon Buy

Simpli Home Solid Wood Modern Industrial Writing Desk $281 (was $540, now 48% off) We could picture this desk in a stylish architect’s office. (Plus, it’s on sale.) $281 at Amazon Buy $281 at Amazon Buy

Convenience Concepts Gold Coast Mirrored Desk $192 (was $205, now 6% off) A mirrored desk will make the drudgery of getting your inbox back down to zero a little more glamorous. $192 at Amazon Buy $192 at Amazon Buy

Tribesigns Computer Desk with Hutch and Bookshelf Not only a desk, but a hutch to store all your tchotchkes as well. $169 at Amazon Buy $169 at Amazon Buy

GreenForest Computer Desk with Shelves The intriguing shape and negative space makes this desk quite visually appealing. $70 at Amazon Buy $70 at Amazon Buy
